at.easydiet.view
Interface EasyTableViewRowEditor.RowEditorListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
EasyTableViewRowEditor.RowEditorListener.Adapter, EasyTableViewRowEditor.RowEditorListenerList
Enclosing class:
EasyTableViewRowEditor
public static interface EasyTableViewRowEditor.RowEditorListener

The row editor listener interface. This provides callers with notifications about a row editor's activity.

Nested Class Summary
static class EasyTableViewRowEditor.RowEditorListener.Adapter
          Row editor listener adapter.

Method Detail

previewEditRow

org.apache.pivot.util.Vote previewEditRow(org.apache.pivot.wtk.TableView.RowEditor rowEditor,
                                          org.apache.pivot.wtk.TableView tableView,
                                          int rowIndex,
                                          int columnIndex)
Called to preview a row edit.

Parameters:
rowEditor - The row editor
tableView - The table view containing the row to be edited.
rowIndex - The index of the row to edit.
columnIndex - The index of the column to edit.
Returns:
A vote on whether editing should be allowed to begin.
